title: 700+ PING SPIKES
body:
Hello, I have just been on a 6 weeks vacation and now when Im back I experience ping spikes up to 700 every 5 seconds, and my base ping is around 30 ms. This makes my game experience really horrible with landing skillshots and such. (im a {{champion:432}} otp).



Ive almost tried everything with dns to firewall, and nothing seems to be working. I would really like some help couse I know there are some data nerds here. thanks! {{champion:432}}

replies.body:
Try viewing my post.  Hopefully this helps.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EuizR9Zc-wifi-lag-spikes-fix

It sounds like there's been a change in your network that's having problems maintaining a strong connection.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which provides a set of instructions to troubleshoot.  This should get you squared away! {{champion:432}}
Odds are it's a bunch of packet loss. I'd run a traceroute to their IP to make sure. Same kind of issue I have.
